otlpEndpoint.description: OTLP receiver endpoint that is set as default for all types.

otlpTracesEndpoint.description: OTLP receiver endpoint for traces exporter.

otlpMetricsEndpoint.description: OTLP receiver endpoint for metrics exporter.

otlpLogsEndpoint.description: OTLP receiver endpoint for logs exporter.

otlpTracesInsecure.description: Disable TLS for OpenTelemetry traces exporter.

otlpMetricsInsecure.description: Disable TLS for OpenTelemetry metrics exporter.

otlpLogsInsecure.description: Disable TLS for OpenTelemetry logs exporter.

otlpProtocol.description: OTLP receiver protocol for all exporters. Default is grpc.

otlpCompression.description: Enable compression for OTLP exporters. Accept: none, gzip

otlpTracesCompression.description: Enable compression for OTLP traces exporter. Accept: none, gzip

otlpMetricsCompression.description: Enable compression for OTLP metrics exporter. Accept: none, gzip

otlpLogsCompression.description: Enable compression for OTLP logs exporter. Accept: none, gzip

metricsExporter.description: Metrics export type. Accept: none, otlp, prometheus

logsExporter.description: Logs export type. Accept: none, otlp

prometheusPort.description: Prometheus port for the Prometheus HTTP server. Use /metrics endpoint of the connector server if empty.

disableGoMetrics.description: Disable internal Go and process metrics (prometheus exporter only).

OTLPConfig.description: OTLPConfig contains configuration for OpenTelemetry exporter.
